Posts.Content: Hi I am new to this group, was diagnosed stage 1 in Sep18, had lumpectomy in Oct18, then radiotherapy with last session 17/12. Started Tamoxifen in October. On levothyroxine and citalopram as well. Started with what I thought was thrush but even going to loo caused stinging. Been to drs and not thrush but severe dermatitis down there and skin breaking when wiping. Been back at work since 7/1 and was starting to feel more myself, how many more possible side affects do we have to face? Â
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen causing thrush and soreness

Posts.Content: Hi I have been given 1% hydrocortisone cream to use for 7-10 days very lightly and replens. Feels a bit better after 24 hours so keeping fingers crossed. Thanks for your comments
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen causing thrush and soreness
